Question: Which statements are true regarding the songs sung by Atif Aslam in the album 'Atrangi Yaari'?
Options:
A. 'O Mere Khuda' is sung by Atif Aslam.
B. 'Aa Bhi Jaa Sanam' is included in the album 'Atrangi Yaari'.
C. 'Tere Liye' is one of the original songs in the soundtrack.
D. All of the above

Question: Which songs are sung by Atif Aslam in the album 'Atrangi Yaari'?
Options:
A. O Mere Khuda
B. Aa Bhi Jaa Sanam
C. Tere Liye
D. All of the above
Answer: A) O Mere Khuda, B) Aa Bhi Jaa Sanam

Question: Which songs were sung by Atif Aslam in the album 'Atrangi Yaari'?
Options:
A. O Mere Khuda
B. Aa Bhi Jaa Sanam
C. Tere Liye
D. Kaun Hoon Main
Answer: O Mere Khuda, Aa Bhi Jaa Sanam, Kaun Hoon Main

Question: Which songs were sung by Atif Aslam in the album 'Atrangi Yaari'?
Options:
A. O Mere Khuda
B. Aa Bhi Jaa Sanam
C. Tere Liye
D. Ishq Mein
Answer: O Mere Khuda, Aa Bhi Jaa Sanam
